entry.tran: 脱离论者;分离论者;独立主义者
entry.def: Secessionists are people who want their region or group to become separate from the country or larger group to which it belongs.

example.ex: The government is trying to crush a secessionist movement.
example.tran: 政府正试图镇压一场分离运动。
